website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot SX710 HS is a speedy superzoom with a sharp lens, but image quality is an issue at even moderate ISO sensitivities.

customer_reviews.title: Love its qaulity!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera!! It has great resolution and I love that I can take MOON pictures.....still working on my skills but Im getting there! The battery last a great deal of time too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than a point-and-shoot, but the additional features are worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a point-and-shoot Canon that broke and didn't have all the features I needed (e.g. Sports mode, more manual control). So far, this camera has what I'm looking for, albeit bulkier and heavier than a point-and-shoot. If you think you can just throw this in your pocket and it'll hardly be noticeable, think again. Although the lens does retract into the camera, it is not as compact as a point-and-shoot; however, for having all the additional features I like, I was not surprised by the form factor. I don't understand why the flash is retractable and only makes taking nighttime pictures more cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The resolution is very good, the settings are very flexible
customer_reviews.text: Canon has produced a magnificent camera. I wanted a camera which approached a profession-level camera which was small enough to fit in my pocket. This is it. The resolution is very good, the settings are very flexible, it operates well in low light and it is lightweight and easy to carry. I am an amateur photographer, but many professional photographers have commented on the quality of my photos. After using the SX710 for a year or so, it exceeds my expectations in every way and I when I'm ready for another camera I will look to Canon first.
customer_reviews.author: A. Segovia

customer_reviews.title: excellent for animal photography and COMPACT
customer_reviews.text: I took this on Safari. Many had big cameras with long lenses and juggling them in the vehicle was a lot of work. I could pocket this and pull it out quickly when animal action took place. It was a quick learning curve, looking on line for pointers and how to best use features. I LOVE this camera!
customer_reviews.author: L. Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice compact camera.  Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice compact camera. Not waterproof or able to swim! Back to using my cell phone. Not the camera's fault, it was in my backpack in the canoe when I capsized. It was not soaked, but it doesn't take much to drown a modern camera.
customer_reviews.author: EricS

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Use it when I don't want to lug around my heavy SLR camera. Takes fantastic photos. The zoom is incredible, even when using handheld. It is small and lightweight and feels somewhat fragile so I would highly recommend a good protective case. It is small enough to carry in my purse, in a small case.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and delivers high quality photos
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and delivers high quality photos. The "live" setting allows quick adjustments for light directions and levels, although the camera compensates for changing conditions very well on its own. Don't go out without a spare battery, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Canon Continues to Make a Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Have been an amateur photographer for many years, as well as being an avid Canon user. The SX710 is my third digital Canon camera and it really does go to show you that Canon can continue to make a good thing better! While it does take a little to become familiar with the menu hierarchy for the new Canon user, the time investment is well worthwhile! The additions in the SCN menu are particularly noteworthy. Add to all of this the marvelous resolution and WiFi, this camera is a great addition to anyone's kit.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: Takes excellent pictures. Had to get used to manually opening the flash before being able to take pictures with flash instead of just putting on flash with the menu. And long telephoto shots require a tripod to keep the camera steady. No one can really hold a camera that still. Haven't tried the wifi function yet but it seems to only work under limited circumstances with Canon software. But I still rate the camera 5 stars based on the quality of pictures I got on a recent trip to national parks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Price

customer_reviews.title: Just the Size Camera I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. It has so many features of my SLR....specifically wanted aperture priority. it fits easily into my handbag, beachbag and travels well without the weight and bulk. I do miss the viewfinder though. I do enlargements, at least 8x10, but I have yet to see the quality of larger images. Will add to this review after that.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne K.

customer_reviews.title: Wifi Does Not Work With All Mac OS
customer_reviews.text: Be advised, if you plan to use this camera for its wifi connection to download to a Mac, it will not work with the operating system 10.12 and above. This is why I bought the camera plus of the good photo ratings by Consumer Reports. I am now forced to use a USB cable to download pictures. The quality of my old camera was just as good so what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great powerful camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought camera to take to Europe. It takes breath taking beautiful pictures! Whether daytime or night time. Powerful zoom. Multiple setting options. Great HD video as well. Only thing missing, no HDR, would've been nice addition, but great camera nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: O. Benavide

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME camera! Highly recommended,
customer_reviews.text: My son has taken this camera all over the US and most of Southeast Asia. It takes brilliant photographs and has an EXTREMELY clear zoom, both optical AND digital. Wildlife photos from 50 yards away look like you’re stand8ng next to the subject.
customer_reviews.author: It's all about me

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars for not having the adjustable LCD viewfinder  ... my 4th generation model .... use it to scout locations for commercial
customer_reviews.text: my 4th generation model .... use it to scout locations for commercials, ... great zoom helps to approximate various focal lengths effects/depth of field. ... manual video override works great, and video compression is decent enough to use in previz ..... 4 stars for not having the tiltable LCD viewfinder ... so outdated , geez .... but for the price-to-function ratio = unbeatable
customer_reviews.author: Rudy K.

customer_reviews.title: All in all a great camera
customer_reviews.text: Ive had slr s with interchangable lenses and digitals for convience. This camera is the easiest and fastest way to take great photographs without the hassle of all the accessories. So far its been fast enough to catch every thing but a pitchers arm at a pro game. All in all a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: R. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME beginner camera for anyone who's new to photography. Easy to use, lightweight and great resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Conner

customer_reviews.title: Every lady needs a little black dress and they should ...
customer_reviews.text: Every lady needs a little black dress and they should also have a little black Canon PowerShot camera! For the money, this camera gives you a lot of bang for the buck and has more features than I will ever use......but they are there and ready for me to use when I want to advance my photography skills.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHeart

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this camera yesterday. So far its been great! Takes great pics, it was very easy to charge and set up. Pictures are crisp and clear. It was easy to set up and figure out how to transfer pics to your phone or tablet via Wi-Fi. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Shan Shan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous version that I loved. I dropped it on it's lens. I was so sad! I bought this as a replacement. I love it. It is my old camera but much improved. I didn't have to learn it all over again. All my accessories fit! It is small but still takes great photos and gives you a lot of ability to adjust F-Stops and shutter speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to document my trips to Supernatural Conventions. I got some AMAZING shots thanks to the powerful zoom. I even brought this to an arena and was in the upper level across the arena from the stage and managed to get some SWEET shots of the band!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. Kuhlman

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Fits in your pocket and takes wonderful photos! I'd be happy to deal with this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vlogger camera for budget friendly buyers
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review of this camera but also an update. I've had this camera for almost 4yrs. It's still the best value for my money and the zoom is still great along with the video & picture quality. I would say that I had to get a pop filter for my audio but I think that was more on my part because I dropped my camera once. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Tiungeia Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a Canon fan since the early 1970's. Always had Power Shot models and this is the best of the best. This SX710 is awesome, big bang for the buck. Very high resolution and the mega zoom is awesome. I take lots of wildlife photos and have large lens EOS cameras but use this one the most. It's always in my pocket or glove box in the car. About the size of a pack of cigarettes. Focusing speed is decent and good battery life. But always to carry extra battery as with any model camera for back up.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: but zoom is GREAT. Am a little concerned about the pop-up flash ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it a lot yet, but zoom is GREAT. Am a little concerned about the pop-up flash durability, and again it seems many compact cameras today have, at the very least, a semi-slippery exterior that is a bit disconcerting (I've had worse, but the 'slipperiness' could be designed out of it easily enough by having rubberized sides).
customer_reviews.author: Sci-Fi Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good point and shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. I took it on vacation and took videos and very nice photos. it is easy to carry for family events.
customer_reviews.author: redshoes45

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend, although I'm a novice. Seems to be easy to use. Setting up wireless connection to computer is easier if you watch the YouTube video on the subject. Manual could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: THE SELLER SENT US A DEFECTIVE CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: THE CAMERA SENT TO US WAS DEFECTIVE, AND WE ORDERED ANOTHER ONE, AND IT WORKED JUST FINE.
customer_reviews.author: TLHAWKSTER

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for folks who want a super zoom that can fit in your purse.
customer_reviews.text: Point & shoot or tweak your settings manually to your heat's content, this is a great little camera. As with all super zoom camera you do have to watch for shaking at the higher zooms. Be prepared for that & you will have awesome images. I would suggest playing with the multi-shot with multi-filter setting as I got some really creative shots that were all the camera's idea. My example: I was in a boat out on the water, took a shot of the Space Needle & this was one of the tweaked shots my camera took based on my base shot.
customer_reviews.author: D. Paukstys

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Like every Canon camera I've owned this is well built and easy to use. A lot of features built into a very small package. This camera takes great pictures, very crisp and clear even at high zoom. A great camera at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Beerfish

customer_reviews.title: Best telephoto ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best camera we ever owned. Its the best you can get before advancing to a full-size camera. Best feature is the absolutely terrifc telephoto lens which is optical, not digital.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dunkelman

customer_reviews.title: The pictures seem great. I am still trying to figure out all ...
customer_reviews.text: The pictures seem great. I am still trying to figure out all the features. The video seems to drain the battery very fast so that I am unable to set the camera on a tripod for videoing a one hour event without the camera shutting off in the middle. I am trying to figure that out. Overall, very happy with the size, features and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great combo of small size body and wonderful zoom lens
customer_reviews.text: Takes excellent photos. My old digital Elph bit the dust and my SX40 is heavy to travel with so am trying this out as a combo of both. I still miss the optical viewfinder but with the Golebo anti-glare screen protector it does fine outside in bright sun. Will update more later
customer_reviews.author: Old Georgia Geek

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was awesome and product was in great condition
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was awesome and product was in great condition! But I bought it to shoot in 60fps, and the 60fps mode has Auto ISO and automatic shutter speed as well. Sounds like it should be a good thing, but as a result all the video I shoot in 60 fps comes out super grainy or super choppy. So, love the seller and service, would not recommend the product. I will try and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Whittingham

customer_reviews.title: Portable easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this camera. Easy to carry than my DSLR. Sturdy and good zoom. Video is not bad either. I just watched YouTube videos for instructions on use.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, took this to Europe while backpacking and didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, took this to Europe while backpacking and didn't want to lug around my large camera. The pictures turned out pretty good and this little thing has some cool features.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: Great service great camara.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. Takes nice pictures so far so good. Went with this because of reviews and it uses the same battery as my other camaras.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Had one before and it got damaged. Takes great pictures. It came in great condition. Was hard to find because of all the newer models but I love this one
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used to own a large canon DSLR, but I wanted something smaller to take with me to college. This camera was perfect. I'm constantly wowed by the functions I keep discovering! The picture quality is great and it is very practical to take with you wherever you go. I love this camera and I'm very happy with the decision I made.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F

customer_reviews.title: It did a great job: great zoom
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera to Europe to replace my digital Canon EOS with multiple lenses to minimize weight, bulk, etc. It did a great job: great zoom, easy to use, lot's of neat features. Big bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a camera for our daughter that was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a camera for our daughter that was easy to use, not to big so it would be easy for her to bring it with her everywhere, and of course, a camera that took great pictures. This camera is fantastic! It takes amazing pictures and she is super happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... time stamp but other then that it is an amazing camera. Great for low light
customer_reviews.text: It does not have a time stamp but other then that it is an amazing camera. Great for low light, zoom and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Javier A Parodi

customer_reviews.title: The zoom lens made this camera a great buy. We visited Kruger National Park in South ...
customer_reviews.text: The zoom lens made this camera a great buy. We visited Kruger National Park in South Africa and captured some amazing wildlife photos. It complemented our iPhone 6 camera perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John utter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent photos! Compact camera with awesome zoom, great features and amazing picture quality. Lightweight and can be thrown into a purse or pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Booker

customer_reviews.title: Favorite camera EVER
customer_reviews.text: Favorite camera EVER! Outstanding photos every time. Only down-side is very slow flash - in dark, close environments the flash doesn't activate quickly. But this is outweighed by great performance otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: First time Canon buyer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first real camera, I love it. I don't know much about cameras but I knew for sure I needed something with 1080p 60fps video capabilities. Gotta future proof when I can you know? I'm sure it'll last me a long time and I'll get good quality stuff from the Canon PowerShot SX710
customer_reviews.author: LiiroyJenkiins

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so that we'd have a replacement for our current SX710 when that day comes. Love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for an earlier Canon
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for landscape images. Since I have used it for nothing else, can't comment. But it is light and really serves my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a high quality camera with the flexibility for most conditions. This camera does that exactly and is small enough to easily carry. Works very well even in back light situations.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon L Bailey

customer_reviews.title: An OK Replacement for My Old Canon PowerShot
customer_reviews.text: It replaced my 5-year old Canon PowerShot. My old Canon PowerShot had a broken lens protector and also had degraded image quality. In spite of the poor reliability of my old Canon camera, I bought the new Canon PowerShot because of its relatively good reviews compared to the other camera manufacturers. I like its relatively high image quality. I don't like the larger dimensions compared to my old camera (it often doesn't fit in a shirt pocket), incompatibility of my old Canon PowerShot battery with the new camera, the poor placement of the on/off button (the lens often extends accidently when changing the battery), and the WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene L. Fleeman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHOICE!
customer_reviews.text: When my old digital camera died, I did lots of research and replaced it with this one. GREAT CHOICE!
customer_reviews.author: Mac Simpson

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest camera I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest camera I have owned. The pictures are AMAZING and I love how easy it is to upload the photos from your camera to your computer via wifi! There are so many great features. The creative mode is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Took great pics in Nepal
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Took great pics in Nepal. I used a spare battery and this camera took great pics. It's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder Snow aka ADB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera That Does It All!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. I bought it for a trip to Japan, and I was not disappointed. The zoom is unbelievable -out-performs most changeable lens cameras I've had in the past. Great focus, and I find that I seldom have to take it off Automatic setting. I averaged 300 shots a day, and had to recharge the battery every third day; however, I highly recommend getting an extra battery just-in-case (splurge for the Canon one, and not for an imitator - they work much longer). With a 64GB SD Memory Card, I was able to take 3800 photos and still not fill the card. This is my third Canon PowerShot, and my favorite thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Edward G. Burley

customer_reviews.title: Takes great photos, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted...a fairly simple point and shoot that is easy to carry. It is a little larger than my previous Power Shot but it is quite acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Stote

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Great image stabilizer, quality of picture and ease of use. I will never use of the options that are available but the camera is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wengler

customer_reviews.title: She says pictures are great quality. Will purchase one more for me in ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera was a present for my cousin and she loves it. She says pictures are great quality. Will purchase one more for me in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: JenSarmiento

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love that the Flash is manual and can easily be opened and closed. No unwanted flash.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: This camera is fantastic. My daughter wanted the more expensive version but ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic. My daughter wanted the more expensive version but this one fits all of her needs. She loves to take videos and edit them. The only difficulty we have had is moving video to her MAC. It was not as easy as the directions make it look. All in all this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C

customer_reviews.title: ... cameras before and so ordered another and am very happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: have had Canon cameras before and so ordered another and am very happy with this one, as well. great zoom and pixels.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. We now have two so each of us can take pictures when we go somewhere. Easy to use and crisp images.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Great little point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Great little point and shoot! Took it to Hawaii and had great results! Turned one of the pics of a wedding into a 14x14 canvas prints, and it turned out perfect! Made it easy to take with you so you wouldn't miss that once in a lifetime memory.
customer_reviews.author: likenhiken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used it for two years now Amazing camera love it
customer_reviews.author: ASEEL

customer_reviews.title: I Love this little camera
customer_reviews.text: this is my 4th SX710 HS I keep killing them (drop, drown, lost, etc..) I love this little camera. Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M

customer_reviews.title: nice compact point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long but it takes great pics and is a nice compact size. We will be using it for a BBQ and trips.
customer_reviews.author: cycle_babe075

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great, pics look good but video rather noisy in low light Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Scott

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures and love the zoom
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and love the zoom. I use it for my kids soccer games and still photos at the park. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Hockeychik041

customer_reviews.title: Nice little point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The pictures are sharp. My only complaint is the flash is flemzy and does not pop up automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love the creative shots setting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day. He loves the creative shots setting. He's only complaint is that the directions are difficult to understand and the print is very small. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia A. Spector

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and transfer images. Great resolution. I just there was a bit more room to place my fingers without pressing on buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera with noticeable improvements since the 2000 versions of digital cameras. Slim body and not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: takes a beautiful picture, small enough to fit in pocket
customer_reviews.text: takes a beautiful picture,small enough to fit in pocket, recommend buying extra batteries,
customer_reviews.author: watchfather

customer_reviews.title: Worked great no problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a trip we took. Worked great no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is what he wanted as I love, love mine
customer_reviews.text: Present for my son and he loves it. I have the SX700, and this is essentially the same camera, which is what he wanted as I love, love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Horrom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera. Learning its systems takes more time than for the earlier model.
customer_reviews.author: James D Griffing

customer_reviews.title: Appears so far to be easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as stated. Have been getting use to using it . Will put it to the test on my trip to Europe shortly . Appears so far to be easy to use, has a lot of features that will useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still figuring out how to use the SC710-HS
customer_reviews.text: I chose this camera because I wanted a good-performer that would fit in my pocket. This item meets the need, with very satisfying picture quality. I am still studying how to use it. The only problem so far is the WiFi connection to my Mac Power Book. I have transferred several stills successfully but I have not, so far, been able to transfer videos. I have tried three videos and none have made it to my Mac. I have faith that this situation will improve as I get smarter about the Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Bill of Acton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use Canon. Love the creative shot mode!
customer_reviews.author: Chris  Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and came as described on seller info. No issue with product. Seller delivered.
customer_reviews.author: rednatas

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Here is the perfect camera for traveling and every day shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Perry W. Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this small camera. I need something lightweight as I am out in my kayak when taking shots and I especially love the 30x zoom lens. It takes incredibly clear, crispy shots every time!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Fits in pocket and takes great photos
customer_reviews.text: Very great camera. I bought this for my trip to Europe and wanted a point and shoot camera that had great photo quality and could fit in my pocket. I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: You have to take the battery out to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: muffin 170

customer_reviews.title: You have one job and do it great.
customer_reviews.text: It does its job. It takes beautiful pictures, and great videos.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Canon PowerShot SX710
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera! It's small enough to put in my purse and takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best travel camera EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best travel camera ever. High MP & zoom, beautiful videos & easy to navigate. Nicest combination of features in a pocket sized camera I've ever had. I've had a lot of Canon & Nikon point & shoots. Battery life is much improved over previous versions.
customer_reviews.author: Macman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this camera to photograph apparel for our store website. Exceeds all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Infrasteel

customer_reviews.title: ... was a gift for my wife and she is pretty fussy when it comes to pictures
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife and she is pretty fussy when it comes to pictures. She has been very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Sure Shot canon camera and I loved it so this one is like it but more features. I love the camera and glad I bought it. It also was a fast delivery from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from my elph 130is
customer_reviews.text: Nice upgrade from my elph 130is. Everything works great. I need a camera which is good in low light (no flash) conditions. This camera does well in low light and crisp clear pictures. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: This camera is great, took plenty of shots in the backcountry scenery ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great, took plenty of shots in the backcountry scenery over the week to board, the optical zoom is phenomenal, the quality of pictures and recording, don't miss out. Was still operational at 12 Degrees on the top of the slopes. The wifi connection to phone works great, easy to operate after tinkering with it for awhile. Besides that everything operates great, will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A giant step up from other cameras.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. The image quality is fantastic and the lens is unbelievable. I am still learning the fancy modes of the camera but so far so good. Why do modern cameras need 4 different "auto" settings"? I am used to my old Canon SX280 HS and this one is pretty compatible (same battery, similar layout) so it was ready for a trip the next day. The image quality in all modes is much better than that of the 280. Definitely worth the extra price. With 20M pixels you can afford to use the digital zoom. Just be sure to be using 32M or larger SDHC chips.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Shopping for yet another camera since this one has strong limitations.
customer_reviews.text: It is not a bad camera - lots of features to offer - the biggest thing is the manual flash that can become a pain as well as a display that cannot handle bright shots - it gets over powered and the display goes dark; however, the pictures appear to come out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Springer

customer_reviews.title: Not the usual Canon quality
customer_reviews.text: The camera is much bigger than my older model. Heavy and it takes too long to recycle the flash. The older Canons with a view finder were much better. I've had these type Canons since 2005 and this is the first one that has really disappointed me. I would send it back, but too long to actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Kay

customer_reviews.title: nice quality camera
customer_reviews.text: great camera with a great zoom. I have used it around the world and it works great. loaded with features, big zoom, etc. but is handy enough to grab and take a quick photo
customer_reviews.author: T. J. newnum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The zoom at 30 is fantastic combined with the stabilization makes this a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Blurred photos
customer_reviews.text: It's has a 30X zoom but all the pictures are blurred. I have owned a lot of Canon cameras over the years and this is a terrible example. All the photos I took were unacceptable. I'm returning it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Blueman

customer_reviews.title: Small package, big results.
customer_reviews.text: Sensor and screen produce extremely clear images. Compact and lightweight with 30x optical zoom make the SX710HS the perfect camera to have with you at all times.
customer_reviews.author: wilford w. scott

customer_reviews.title: The one thing I greatly dislike is the Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: Camera performs very well. Still learning some of the features. The one thing I greatly dislike is the Wi-Fi. Extremely difficult to understand instructions. When I thought I did everything the way it said it wouldn't connect. I have given up on Wi-Fi. Been trying for a week. Tried computer, tablet and smart phone. no luck. If I had to rate the camera on only the camera I would give it a 5. But because of Wi-Fi problems only a 3.
customer_reviews.author: RHSh

customer_reviews.title: Good for day time shots and smart phone connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Good for day time shots and smart phone connectivity. Disappointed with following: 1. Poor low light - max (iso 3200) blur and grainy. 2. low frames per second. 3. very slow shutter speed. 5. Lacks sharp details throughout the complete picture. Save your money/time, I highly recommend getting the Sony DSC-HX60V/B.
customer_reviews.author: T. Coble

customer_reviews.title: so far it seems to be an excellent product. I like the NFC function
customer_reviews.text: Need to use it on a trip; however, so far it seems to be an excellent product. I like the NFC function. I am not happy that I can't set it up to automatically backup my photos to Dropbox. (Or, if I can, I haven't figured out how yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot SX710 HS - Wi-Fi Enabled (Black)
product_meta.description:
Style:Base30x Optical Zoom (25–750mm)
-
20.3 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor combined with the DIGIC 6 Image Processor
-
Built-in Wi-Fi allows wireless transferring of images and video to compatible mobile devices

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

ZOOM POWER TO GO
For capturing everything from vacation videos to everyday snaps, you'll want the high-zoom, compact-body PowerShot SX710 HS camera by your side. Powerfully advanced yet easy to use, this camera is prepared to handle a variety of situations. The amazing 30x Optical Zoom gives you the versatility you need to take your still images and breathtaking 1080p Full HD video to the next level, with Intelligent IS and Zoom Framing Assist to keep even your highest zoom shots clear and steady. Experience sophisticated video capabilities including 60p/30p/24p and MP4 options, the ability to add background music to your clips in Story Highlights, and advanced Dynamic IS that keeps video steady even when you shoot while running or walking backwards. Built-in Wi-Fi® and NFC make sharing what you've captured simple. With a 20.3 Megapixel* High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor and DIGIC 6 Image Processor that create the Canon HS SYSTEM for excellent low-light performance, all packed into a slim design, this camera is perfect for travelers, families, and anyone who appreciates superb quality and performance.

* Image processing may cause a decrease in the number of pixels.

BIG ZOOM DELIVER OUTSTANDING VERSATILITY
30X OPTICAL ZOOM (25–750MM)
With the PowerShot SX710 HS camera in hand, you'll be impressed at the zooming capabilities of this slim, compact digital camera. The amazing 30x Optical Zoom gets you just where you want to be: down on the field, high atop a skyscraper, deep into a landscape and much more. The camera's advanced technology helps ensure that images and videos are captured in outstanding quality, with Intelligent IS that chooses the stabilization method that's best for the shooting conditions, so images are virtually shake-free in a wide variety of situations.

INTELLIGENT IS
It's easy to capture clear, steady images, even in low light without using a tripod. That's because the camera is equipped with Canon's innovative Intelligent IS. The system automatically analyzes camera movement and applies the best shake correction method for the shooting situation – allowing you to focus on framing and capturing your shot. For stills, the system selects from Normal IS, Panning IS, Macro (Hybrid) IS and Tripod modes. When shooting video, the system selects from Dynamic IS, Powered IS, Macro (Hybrid) IS and active Tripod IS modes. Icons clearly mark the image stabilization mode, whether you're shooting still images or video.

Still Image Shooting Normal IS Corrects for a wide range of camera movement when shooting stills. Panning IS Panning motion is detected so that IS does not interfere with desired camera movement. Macro (Hybrid) IS Corrects for shift-type camera shake, which typically occurs in macro (close-up) shooting. Tripod When tripod use is detected, the Image Stabilizer is stopped because it is not needed. Video Recording Dynamic IS Effective for video shooting at wide-angle focal lengths, eliminating the unwanted shaking that typically occurs while walking. Powered IS Compensates for hand movement when shooting video at the telephoto end of the zoom range, where camera shake is magnified. Macro (Hybrid) IS Corrects for motion blur that is likely to occur when shooting video while walking. Also compensates for the shift-type camera shake common in macro shooting. Active Tripod IS When shooting video while using a tripod, the image stabilization is active to compensate for slight camera shake. CONNECT AND SHARE WITH A TOUCH
BUILT-IN NFC (NEAR FIELD COMMUNICATION)
PowerShot digital cameras with built-in NFC (Near Field Communication) technology eliminates the need to manually find and open the new Canon Camera Connect app* on your mobile device. Simply touch the NFC icon on your camera to your compatible Android™ device**, and the Camera Connect app will launch automatically for quick, easy sharing of your images. Built-in NFC technology also makes it simpler to install the app. If the app hasn't been installed yet, once you touch the devices together for the first time, the download screen will display automatically. Now, NFC helps ensure making a connection to a compatible Android™ device* truly seamless. Simply touch the camera against an NFC-equipped device with the Canon Camera Connect app installed, and the Wi-Fi® connection is established no camera operations required. Even if your camera is off, NFC turns the camera on and establishes the connection (confirming the camera's nickname and privacy settings before the first connection is required).

BUILT-IN WI-FI® MAKES SHARING QUICK AND EASY
Built-in Wi-Fi® technology for on-the-go convenience when you want to share your photos and videos with friends, family and the whole world. Easily post your images to social networking and media sites – Facebook®, Twitter®, YouTube™, Flickr®, and Google Drive™ – through CANON iMAGE GATEWAY*** directly from your PowerShot camera, or save them to the online photo album to share anytime, anywhere. The camera can also connect directly to both iOS® and Android™ devices*, and upload images via the free Canon Camera Connect app* without a computer. You can control the destination of your uploads to share with everyone or to selected groups, and even add comments. Sharing video is also easy with Wi-Fi® equipped PowerShot cameras, which record video using the easy-to-share MP4 format. Enhanced Wi-Fi® makes posting in real time possible, so you can keep everyone up to date with photos and video even as events unfold. Wi-Fi® technology also allows you to transfer images to other Wi-Fi® equipped PowerShot cameras or print your photos directly to a PictBridge (Wireless LAN) certified printer.

IMAGE SYNC FUNCTION
The Image Sync Function has been improved and expanded. In addition to wirelessly transferring photos and videos through CANON iMAGE GATEWAY*** to your computer, now you can view and download them from your smartphone.**** Take them anywhere, anytime, and use your familiar smartphone operations to view and share them.

REMOTE SHOOTING WITH THE CAMERA CONNECT APP
Remote shooting functions of the PowerShot SX710 HS camera through your smartphone or tablet has been vastly improved with the new Canon Camera Connect app. Now a variety of the camera's expressive capabilities are available to you: use different shooting modes (P, Av, Tv, M); enjoy multi-aspect shooting and display; choose AF frame modes (single-point/face detection); shoot in continuous shooting mode; and utilize the AF button. In addition, the new Camera Connect app is now universal to PowerShot and Canon EOS cameras with built-in Wi-Fi®, so if you switch between cameras, operation is easy and familiar.

MOBILE DEVICE CONNECT BUTTON
The camera's dedicated Mobile Device Connect Button gives you one-touch access to your compatible mobile device or computer (utilizing Image Sync function). You can transfer photos and videos to your smartphone or tablet for immediate sharing to a computer on the same network. When the camera finds a linked computer on the same wireless network, images are sent directly to it. Otherwise, images are temporarily stored on CANON iMAGE GATEWAY*** then transferred once a connection is made – very convenient when you're on vacation or out for the day.

* Compatible with iOS versions 6.0/6.1/7.0/7.1/8.0/8.1, Android smartphone versions 2.3.3/4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3/4.4 and Android tablet versions 4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3/4.4. Data charges may apply. With the download of the free Canon Camera Connect app. This software helps enable you to upload images to social network services. Before uploading images, please be aware that image files may contain privacy-related information such as people and places. If necessary, please delete such information. Canon does not obtain, collect or use such images or any information included in such images through this software.
** Compatible with Android devices versions 4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3/4.4.
*** One-time registration is required on CANON iMAGE GATEWAY online photo album.
**** With the download of the free Canon Online Photo Album app. The images and videos utilizing Image Sync can be viewed and downloaded with your smartphone or tablet within 30 days.

YOUR ONE-STOP IMAGE MANAGEMENT SOLUTION
COMPATIBILITY WITH CANON CONNECT STATION CS100
The PowerShot SX710 HS camera is fully compatible with Canon's brand new photo and video storage device: the Canon Connect Station CS100. By simply tapping with NFC, photos and videos are wirelessly transferred to the Connect Station CS100, where up to 1 TB of hard drive space (has the capacity for approximately 150,000 photos or approximately 70 hours of video content)* and simple menus make them easy to store, manage and sort by albums, date or device name. From there, images and videos can be viewed in Full HD on an HDTV (via an HDMI cable), sent to compatible wireless printers, viewed/uploaded/downloaded from smartphones and tablets or PCs, and shared with other Connect Stations and on social networking sites.

* Calculated with approx. 6.6MB for each photo and with average 32Mbps Full HD video.

PHENOMENAL IMAGES AND INCREDIBLE PERFORMANCE START HERE
20.3 MEGAPIXEL* HIGH-SENSITIVITY CMOS SENSOR
The PowerShot SX710 HS camera employs a 20.3 Megapixel* High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor, which delivers state-of-the-art imaging performance and is optimized for use in compact cameras. Utilizing a sophisticated light-capturing design, it provides high sensitivity for improved high ISO capture with reduced noise. It is also a high-speed design, capable of rapidly capturing and moving image data to the processor, enabling faster continuous shooting and faster autofocus.

* Image processing may cause a decrease in the number of pixels.

DIGIC 6 IMAGE PROCESSOR
The PowerShot SX710 HS camera is equipped with the DIGIC 6 Image Processor, which makes several important advancements to image quality both in stills and video. Improved light sensitivity allows for higher resolution with less noise when shooting in dark conditions, and Dynamic IS now detects and compensates for tilt and parallel movement (shift blur) to create video that's virtually free of distortion. The processor also enhances the performance capabilities of the PowerShot SX710 HS, enabling high-speed, high quality continuous still image shooting at up to 6.0 frames per second. And video recording is better than ever, as the DIGIC 6 Image Processor enables Full HD at 60p, as well as MP4 recording. Highly compressed MP4 video not only preserves space on your memory card but also improves playback on mobile devices. Plus, with MF Peaking possible thanks to the DIGIC 6 Image Processor, you'll have a pro-level focusing tool at your disposal.

CANON HS SYSTEM
The PowerShot SX710 HS camera gives you the power to capture beautifully detailed, naturally lit images even in low light – reducing the need for flash and the occasionally unwelcome effects it produces. That's because the camera's 20.3 Megapixel* High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor works with the camera's latest generation DIGIC 6 Image Processor to create the Canon HS SYSTEM, specifically engineered for spectacular low-light performance. With the Canon HS SYSTEM, you'll experience excellent tracking performance even in low light, and achieve gorgeous still image quality at ISO speeds up to ISO 3200; beautiful low-light shots are possible with minimal noise and maximum detail in highlight and shadow areas.

*Image processing may cause a decrease in the number of pixels.

SOPHISTICATED VIDEO CAPABILITIES
FULL HD VIDEO
The PowerShot SX710 HS camera is designed to make beautiful, creative video capture easy and fun. Image quality is luminous and lifelike in 1080p Full HD, with selectable frame rates of 60p, 30p and 24p to match the situation and end use. MP4 format, perfect for sharing and mobile devices, is also available. Newly improved Dynamic IS offers 5-axis image stabilization that corrects even the strong camera shake that happens when you shoot while running or walking backward.

SHORT CLIP MOVIE
New Short Clip Movie lets you shoot videos of 4 to 6 seconds as easily as capturing a snapshot; then, during playback, you can apply impressive effects including Normal speed, Fast motion, Slow motion and Replay.

CLEAR VIEWING, EASY SHOOTING
3.0-INCH HIGH RESOLUTION (922,000 DOTS) LCD
The large, 3.0-inch high-resolution LCD screen makes it easy to both frame and review your shots. A resolution of 922,000 dots makes even the smallest details clear, and images are viewable even from a wide angle, so showing others what you've captured is easy, too.

SUPER ZOOMING NOW EASIER THAN EVER
IMPROVED ZOOM FRAMING ASSIST
The camera's Zoom Framing Assist function offers a variety of support for capturing excellent long telephoto shots. When you press and hold the Zoom Framing Assist button, the camera will automatically zoom out to include a wider angle of view, enabling you to more easily locate your moving subject. Once you find it, releasing the button returns the lens to its original zoom position, keeping the subject in focus until you're ready to shoot. You can even make zoom adjustments while the button is pressed, with an animated assist frame that makes viewing easy. When the button is released, the lens will return to the adjusted zoom position. Zoom Framing Assist also offers a seek assist function that detects when you're panning (for instance, to search for the ball on a field) and automatically zooms out to help; stop panning, and the zoom returns to its original position. Zoom Framing Assist keeps even a moving subject's face the same size in the frame with a tap to the Zoom Framing Assist function button; the feature is especially useful for capturing the expressions of fast-moving children. The system lets you choose the subject's size: choices include face, upper body, whole body, manual or off, and now AUTO. In AUTO, the camera evaluates camera movement, distance to subject, and the number of faces to automatically zoom in and out to stay focused on subjects and shoot them at the optimal size, even automatically zooming in to find faces when they are too small. Also new, an Auto Zoom feature that makes it easy for others (at a tourist spot, for example) and even children to take a great picture of you: the camera automatically zooms to frame the shot to just the right size. Conveniently, all Zoom Framing Assist functions are also available when shooting video.

RETHINK PHOTOGRAPHY WITH CREATIVE SHOT
CREATIVE SHOT MODE
PowerShot digital cameras with Creative Shot mode help turn your images into impressive artistic photos! Rather than randomly applying filters, Creative Shot mode takes advantage of advanced Canon technologies to analyze the individual scene, subject and exposure to apply any of 46 filter options. In addition to the original shot, the camera automatically produces and saves five additional variations of the composition. Filter choices are grouped into Retro, Monochrome, Special and Natural categories to make exploring the world of artistic photography fun and easy, or simply select Auto to access the full range of effects. With Creative Shot mode, the result is stunning artistic photos that are perfect for sharing.

CREATE A SHORT STORY WITH YOUR IMAGES
STORY HIGHLIGHTS
View your still images and video† as a fun short story with the Story Highlights feature on the new PowerShot SX710 HS camera. You can choose to have the camera create one automatically, creating a short video of approximately three minutes* according to date, event or people, or you can customize your Story Highlights reel for a fun, unique video*. New Story Highlights BGM lets you add background music (choose from three pre-loaded songs) to the clips that Story Highlights automatically generates, for a new level of emotive expression. It's all done in camera, without the need for any additional software. Easily access and enjoy your Story Highlights – simply press the Story Highlights button to start creating your highlight album. The Story Highlights album can be saved to the camera's memory card for quick replay and also shared with the PowerShot SX710 HS camera's built-in Wi-Fi®.

† Videos must be shot in Hybrid Auto or Short Clip. 
* Length of highlight video varies according to the photos and videos added to the Story Highlights album.

CAPTURE PHOTOS AND VIDEO CAREFREE WITH ADVANCED POWERSHOT TECHNOLOGIES
HYBRID AUTO
Capture the essence of special days – vacations, important occasions or any time you're shooting many shots in a day – using Hybrid Auto on the PowerShot SX710 HS camera. Hybrid Auto records up to four seconds of video every time you shoot a still image, then automatically joins the day's clips and pictures** into a video. The feature also makes sure the "highlight reel" is stunningly beautiful by automatically recognizing the scene and optimizing camera settings to capture the highest possible image quality. The resulting 720p HD video is properly exposed, crisp and steady.

** Pictures can be withheld from the resulting video via menu settings.

SMART AUTO
Smart AUTO on the PowerShot SX710 HS camera makes capturing sharp, bright colorful images and video as simple as pressing the shutter button. By assessing various factors in both the background and the subject, the system recognizes 58 predefined shooting situations and automatically selects the camera settings that will yield the best possible results. Simply frame the shot you want, and in dozens of common or challenging scenarios the camera takes care of the rest. Hard-to-capture shots such as moving subjects, night scenes, backlit subjects, and landscapes at evening or on a bright snowy day are instantly and effortlessly captured as "keeper" shots. Smart AUTO makes the PowerShot SX710 HS ideal for capturing excellent quality still images and video on the go.

* 58 predefined shooting situations for still images, and 21 predefined shooting situations for video.

SHOOTING MODES
Manual You have complete control of exposure, selecting both aperture and shutter speed manually. Aperture-Priority You set the aperture, controlling depth-of-field. The camera automatically selects the shutter speed. Shutter-priority You select the shutter speed, and the camera automatically selects the appropriate aperture. Program The camera automatically and intelligently selects the aperture/shutter speed combination based on the shooting conditions. Live View Control Enables Brightness, Color, and Tone adjustments to your images using easy-to-understand controls. Hybrid Auto Automatically selects shooting settings for optimal quality and records a video clip every time you capture a still image. One day's worth of clips are then combined into a single video. Smart AUTO The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity. Creative Shot Analyzes the scene and applies a number of creative filters to automatically create five variations in addition to the original image. Sports The camera uses high shutter speeds to capture fast-moving subjects. Portrait Brings the subject into focus while beautifully blurring the background. Smart Shutter The camera automatically takes the photo when people smile, wink, or get into frame. Handheld Night Scene Take clear and steady pictures at night without the use of a tripod. Low Light For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly lit situations. Snow Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint. Fireworks Create brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks. Fisheye Effect Now you can get the fisheye effect – a classic photographic distortion – without a fisheye lens. Miniature Effect Give images a miniature look with an effect that emphasizes perspective by blurring the top and bottom of the image. Toy Camera Effect Simulates photos taken with "toy" or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect. Soft Focus Creates a hazy ambiance that's perfect for portraits and wedding photos. Monochrome Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue. Super Vivid Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors. Poster Effect Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts. Short Clip Movie Record a short movie (of 4 to 6 seconds) and choose from 4 playback effects. Movie Record video in stereo sound. Unwanted scenes can be deleted in playback mode. iFrame Movie The Apple® movie format, iFrame, makes it easier and quicker to import and upload videos while retaining high image quality. Actual results may vary from examples shown above.
Final image may vary depending on picture composition.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
HIGH SPEED AF
The PowerShot SX710 HS camera is equipped with Canon's latest advancements in autofocus (AF) technology. Canon's advanced AF achieves a significant increase in speed for a shooting experience that's spontaneous and natural. The remarkably responsive High Speed AF lets you capture great shots as they happen, with reduced lag time.

Several engineering breakthroughs contributed to this major enhancement to speed. In addition to improved AF algorithms, the camera can process multiple sequences simultaneously, and takes advantage of reworked controls between AF and the start of shooting.

FULL RESOLUTION CONTINUOUS SHOOTING
Powered by the advanced DIGIC 6 Image Processor, the PowerShot SX710 HS camera gives you Continuous Shooting (approximately 6 frames per second) at the camera's full resolution of 20.3 Megapixels*. This lets you freeze action with stunning clarity to create spectacular images.


* Image processing may cause a decrease in the number of pixels.
feature_bullets: 20.3 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor combined with the DIGIC 6 Image Processor
Built-in Wi-Fi allows wireless transferring of images and video to compatible mobile devices
Capture stunning 1080p Full HD video (60p/30p/24p options) with a dedicated movie button
Large 3.0-inch LCD with a screen resolution of 922,000 dots allows easy viewing even from a wide angle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars264 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
